entity.name: Fred Guttenberg
entity.description: an American activist against gun violence

text: @fred_guttenberg YES! I'm all for peaceful protests. But everyone of these fools needs a Scarlett letter. Showing up in Mass to protest SIP should be automatic forefit of covid-19 medical care. (BTW if this were a crowd of black folks waving guns they'd be confronted with the seat team)
